attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel that it is highly unfair that we are taxed on every penny we earn, in many cases this leaves familys with less than enough money to live on. we should abolish or at least decrease the amount we pay to the government out of our hard earned wages.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several in existence already - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=+abolish+income+tax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
